name: Below the Barrel
description:
You are part of an asteroid mining expedition and you have fallen down to the core! Even worse! The lava is rising! Use your limited jump fuel to get to the top!

Gain jump fuel by grabbing the brown boxes with up arrows on them.

Below the Barrel is a very short skill based platformer, where you have a limited amount of times you can jump. Made for NJamS 1, a small 72-hour game jam.
